website_summaries.verdict: This is the ideal credit card reader for small businesses looking to do business anywhere.
pros: Easy to set up and use
This reader works with Android and Apple devices
Allows you to send receipts via email, text message, or to connect a printer
cons: Some buyers said that the reader moves around too much to get a good swipe

customer_reviews.title: Get the app first!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - but I didn’t know if you download the app you can get a free reader!!! Ugh. It’s okay I guess because this wasn’t super expensive and now I have another on hand and another sticker saying I can accept credit card payments 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Sala

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an art show and it was so simple to download the app and use. It was quick and efficient and customers loved the availability for POS purchases. I was even able to email out receipts and invoices. It was such a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this product since it made craft fairs a lot easier for me, but I have to say I don't really like the card reader itself. The app works great but the card reader never worked. I'd personally recommend just paying a little more money to get the chip reader because unlike the magstrip reader the chip reader worked great and is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Quackmeback

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it’s free on the app
customer_reviews.text: Great product but don’t buy it you can get a free one through the app
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Works great, even with iphone 7+ earphone jack
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I have an iPhone 7 plus so I had to use my little extra jack for earphones (which is so annoying btw, but that's on Apple, not Square lol) but everything worked fine. I swiped my own card to test it out when setting up Square, it read my card just fine, transaction went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Little square game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a life saver!! Of course you can get a card reader from the company for free, but I wanted two of them and I could not find a better deal than this! I purchased this for business reasons but also used it at a yard sale and it worked wonderfully (and allowed for sales that would not have happened otherwise). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Square has competitive rates against others, and as much as I don't like them taking 3% out of every swipe for small businesses, but, it is a reliable way for clients to pay for services and they are consistent with getting it to your bank account.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin

customer_reviews.title: ... because the reader moves too much to provide a good
customer_reviews.text: I punch in all my clients cards manually because the reader moves too much to provide a good swipe
customer_reviews.author: Kat77

customer_reviews.title: The Support System disappointed me
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that I got rejected and when I contacted support they couldn’t give me an straight answer, I understand people get rejected but at least I’d spect a reason for why I am. I’m told for security reasons they can’t really see why so I’m thinking what type of system do they have? Like why can’t they simply tell me why I’m rejected. My father did the same as I did and he got accepted so I do not understand why I’m being rejected and the support really does not help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: it worked better. One had to swipte 2 or three times ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Square Card Reader for an event where I wanted to sell my posters and books. After I took off the case on my iPhone, it worked better. One had to swipte 2 or three times to get it to read, but it worked. There is an option where you can enter the card details if the swipe doesn't work. I liked how easy it was to set up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ames

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Both the Square and the app on the phone are easy to use. I just used the Square at an event, and it allowed me to take credit cards, making sales I otherwise would have missed. I love that it fits in my purse. Since I always carry a couple copies of my book around, I might use it sometime. They make pouches for it, but I’m using the plastic container that Extra gum comes in (It’s perfect: slim and durable).
customer_reviews.author: Kari Ann Martindale

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy using this product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this product. It's helpful with me keeping my business flowing. No more missing payments from clients because of not having a credit card machine. You can keep your clients happy as well as the business growing. It has an easy set up process. Just log in with an email account, pay pal account, or checking account etc..no hassle. I like my credit card reader. I definitely would recommend this product to other people too. Thanks...such a great idea for small Business owners
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: NICE. B+
customer_reviews.text: works great, you can get one for free if you sign up on their website and wait for them to send you one in the mail. but it works great they have a chip card reader now that is almost $50 if you use these alot I would consider getting that one becasue every card has a chip now. easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Needed for any at home business!
customer_reviews.text: Struggling to take your business to the next level? Want to take cards but afraid of the cost? Square is perfect for any small business owner and for $5 (plus a small fee on every swipe) you can't afford not to accept cards! I use this to make $10 sales regularly and Square takes just over a quarter which honestly is worth it to me so I don't lose a sale to people not having cash(which I hear all the time). I highly recommend square as it is portable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Will nice to have he extra though
customer_reviews.text: Learned after when you download app they send you one free. Will nice to have he extra though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Square magstripe card reader at a bargain price (headphone jack/adapter required)
customer_reviews.text: If you need another one, this is a much better price than buying direct. The magstripe reader even works on my Chromebook in virtual terminal or the Android Square POS app (too bad the Contactless & Chip reader doesn't). These days you really should be using the Square Contactless and Chip Reader, because it's much more secure and business friendly, and it doesn't need a headphone jack (it's Bluetooth). That's also available on Amazon at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: TinyZombie

customer_reviews.title: It's supposed to be essentially free according to square, but they actually paid me to buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I like how quickly it arrived since I needed to start taking credit cards for the business I just took over. I had two old android phones sitting around so this was an easy add-on. You can pin the square app so that the employee or customer won't accidentally close out the app. I will update once we start using it in the office tomorrow. I also bought a chip reader which also came with one of these mag stripe things. Make sure you get your $10 back by going to squareup.com/redeem. The code is in the back of the instruction manual. The item was only $5.95 on Amazon yesterday so Square essentially paid me $4.05 to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: WarrDoggy

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: It works absolutely marvelous with my business that I am raising baby birds. So a lot of times I’m delivering babies all over the state and sometimes out-of-state and people want to pay the credit cards or debit card. With this I don’t have to worry about people that want to play with I can take this with me wherever I go I am as long as I have a signal on my phone at my iPad I can take all types of payments. Best Buy
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Needed for Craft Show
customer_reviews.text: I have used a Square reader in the past but of course I misplaced it so had to purchase a new one. These readers are great for vendor shows. They are small and easy to use. I like that you can also use them offline too so no worries if you can't get wi-fi or data where your show is. All you need to do is set up a Square account (easily done online), list all your inventory and you're ready to go! Takes about 10 minutes if you don't already have an account.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly each time I swiped a card with no issues. Simple set up using the Square App. I had it open and running for 6 hours with minimal data usage. Highly recommend this card reader.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price, no rebate
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. I’ll update this review later with more specifics. Just don’t bank on that rebate. My code had already been used... remember back in the 90’s when Pokémon card sellers would open packs, take out the best cards, then reseal the pack, selling the rare cards separately for a higher price? I feel like it’s a bit like that. I spent $6 instead of $10, sure, but my rebate had been used by *someone* so I ended up spending $6 more than I would have if I had bought an unopened $10 square 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen L.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The set-up was relatively easy (after one brief hiccup), and since then it has been an easy and convenient way for me to take payments. Do watch for when the Ap updates, as you may have trouble the first time you go to use the square after an update.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Works great & fast
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Just download the free app, plug in the reader (I have an iPhone 6) and swipe the card. The charge went right through. The next day the amount had already transferred to my bank. Also you get a $10.00 credit refund from Square using the included redemption code once you setup your Square account.
customer_reviews.author: tbirdvet

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to have. But fees are ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: As a business owner this makes life so much easier! However I wish it had a flat rate charge rather than the 2.8% beecause with me I handle rather large transactions. And the charge gets quite pricey. And inconveniences my customers. Also the larger manual entry fee is ridiculous if they don’t change this. a competitor is sure to emerge with much more attractive charges
customer_reviews.author: John Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use square jack
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Works. Easy to use. After I bought this, I got knew phone that wasn’t compatible, but my husband showed me that you can use an adaptor and then still use. Because it goes in the headphone jack, and my phone don’t got one of those. But with an adapter I can still use this.
customer_reviews.author: Meyer family

customer_reviews.title: You can get one for free....
customer_reviews.text: Good, but guess what? You can get one for free just for signing up with Square.
customer_reviews.author: Zoie A Harker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product makes it very easy to take cards on your phone. I don’t like the fact that you can only use the square app, but overall it’s a awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Brummett

customer_reviews.title: Big help at cons
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use. Bought it quickly before and event and I made a lot more because I had this. My only non complaint is you can get this free if you order through square site?? I believe they have a free offer with an account set up but I was too pressed for time to order it through that.
customer_reviews.author: Tomyo

customer_reviews.title: the set up was easy and instructions clear and very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a craft fair and even though I didn't get to use it, the set up was easy and instructions clear and very helpful. This card lets you make mock purchases to get the feel of how it works. I was a little intimidated by it at first but it truly is easy to use and I found it to be something I will look forward to using in the future. 4 stars because you can get it free. I bought it because the free one was going to get here too late.
customer_reviews.author: Des C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $ - these are free thru square app
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before I signed up for square. After installing the app, it tells me they will send me this exact card reader FOR FREE... I could not get my phone to recognize the card reader when it was time to use it. So I had to do everything at my craft show manually anyway (which also charges a higher percentage fee). Disappointing all around.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra VO

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product at my first art fair. It was extremely easy to set up and use. Never had a problem with it the entire two days of the fair. Kept perfect records of my transactions and even gives you instant feedback comments from customers. I wouldn't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any business
customer_reviews.text: Using a Square is so easy! This is the best product for taking credit card sales. I used the one I bought here on Amazon for the first time when I sold at a holiday event. Every sale completed smoothly and I was able to send receipts to my customers via email or text. A must have for any business.
customer_reviews.author: Robin's Creative Space

customer_reviews.title: Works great--easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take payments at a craft fair and it worked great! No trouble with setup, no trouble with payment processing or receiving the money. The app is free to download and they take a small percentage of the sale price which was totally worth it for the convenience--but you don't need anything except your phone, this little device and the free app. Pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Meg F.

customer_reviews.title: Works, but still expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to set up. It's still pricey for merchant services. I don't know how this credit card, processing fees thing hasn't been blown up yet in the modern computing age. Seriously, where's the uber of merchant services? I guess I'm just salty that to collect funds from my customers I have to pay 2-4% off the top.
customer_reviews.author: DVM

customer_reviews.title: i like being able to accept credit cards at markets
customer_reviews.text: i like being able to accept credit cards at markets. it's a good feature. not a fan of the 2% overhead, but it expands my customer base. Also came with 10$ back, so the reader itself was free. they must be doing ok.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Anschuetz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They don’t read cards. I have to enter card numbers each use.
customer_reviews.author: Christy A Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great product, so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Used for my craft shows. Worked great but will not fit on your cell if you have a thick case on it. The plug won't go all the way into the phone to connect. So I just used without my added cover. No issues then.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Best

customer_reviews.title: i didnt like that i paid for one of these but when ...
customer_reviews.text: i didnt like that i paid for one of these but when you download the app they send you one for free- they refunded which was nice and easy.
customer_reviews.author: April Lynn Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This worked great.
customer_reviews.text: This is A MUST for anyone who might ever need to take credit card payments. I don't usually take credit cards but have been asked by a few people to do that. This worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Debbie Blank

customer_reviews.title: Was incredibly useful!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing easier than signing up for a square account! If you want a home or mobile register for your business this is a simple solution and square does a lot of the legwork for you with a terrific app that they constantly update. Would recommend for anyone serious about accepting card payments
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wells

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Another purchase for my craft show. Came in VERY handy for sales I would have lost if I didn't have it. A must have for me!
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play swipe card reader
customer_reviews.text: The square reader is very easy to set up and use. It's basically plug and play. However, this is the older type with swipe capability only and most readers now are using the chip or contactless.
customer_reviews.author: Beriah Sellers

customer_reviews.title: I dont like it very small
customer_reviews.text: It s not very useful the price is ok but hard to keep it connected with phone it falls all the time some times get disconnected while you are busy with customers ao it put you in a hassle
customer_reviews.author: rachid hmidouch

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!  Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this unit as a back up to the unit that I got from my bank. It ended up being so much easier to use that it is now my primary source for accepting credit cards at street fairs. The app is simple and I am funded promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We uses these at our annual golf event this year. Easy to use, the players were confident in their purchase and the services offered by Square are amazing. This was a great way to allow players to pay on the go, and avoided cash transactions during the event.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Duling

customer_reviews.title: doesnt swipe all the way
customer_reviews.text: the reader is very fragile, the connector part broke and stuck inside my phone headjacket now. so my phone is on headset mode, and i can only use speaker to talk.
customer_reviews.author: PuffyEyes

customer_reviews.title: Cool.
customer_reviews.text: Works well! It's a good idea to invest in the keychain cases so you don't misplace/lose it especially if you use it on the go.. Be aware that every transaction comes with a percentage charge, for those who don't know Square.
customer_reviews.author: I Am C-Squared

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged/didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It never worked. Unfortunately, I missed the window to return by a few days. Hopefully I can continue contact seller to see if they will send me another.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Good Square
customer_reviews.text: I had to use my husband's phone and number as I had somehow screwed up my first square account. This one rarely missed a swipe the who weekend for our pop up shop for a foundation fundraiser.
customer_reviews.author: The Sound Refinery

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great item . Very small and east to use. I didn't like that it seems to fit loose in the phone socket . It may depend on the type of phone you own .
customer_reviews.author: BJC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat gadget
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat gadget. Easy to use. Convenient. There is a minimal charge for every transaction. My daughter uses it to charge for fund raisers. There is a 6 cents charge for 2 dollars
customer_reviews.author: George Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have nowadays at craft shows or anywhere that you might be selling things. It's great once people know that you have this. They tend to buy a few more things!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don’t purchase this- they are given away for free on the website for square readers.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Actually I purchased Square several years ago. I bought this one because I lost the original and as soon as I ordered the new one I found the original. I write and sell books and I use it to sell my books at various conferences around the country. I use it with my iPad but it can also be used with my iPhone. It's simple to use and I'm not good with computers. It's a great product for small business. Never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: Great for business
customer_reviews.text: Great product for anyone who is their own boss. I use it to sell artwork. In the app though, when I activated the square, it charged me for another one and sent it to me in the mail for some reason. I mean, I'm glad I have 2 now, but I could have just started with the app instead of buying it first.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for people who are starting their own businesses! Best part is that it's free with no charges!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynne Mudd

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: The square is small and portable. I carry it in my briefcase. I never know when a client will pay by credit card and I want to be ready.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Letzmann

customer_reviews.title: Really useful
customer_reviews.text: The setup process really isn't that hard. This is a great tool to have on you, it fits perfectly in the change section of my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Thompson

customer_reviews.title: CAN NOT BE USED OUTSIDE THE U.S.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work outside the US. So it was a waste of time buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lynika

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure.
customer_reviews.text: So the installment of the app was very easy and they even sent me one for free, but you must have a bank credit card in order for it to work, unfortunately I only have a Walmart prepaid card so I'm unable to use it. A fellow co-worker does use one and says it's a great device to have and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Masoner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Square Reader for magstripe (with headset jack)
customer_reviews.text: Very very easy to use, easy to install and the value for the money was amazing. This is perfect for our business. So easy to use that it does seem to good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Propes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for customers and myself
customer_reviews.text: Need it for Vendor shows and works great. Super easy to set up account and to use. Helps to get more sales and to give receipts.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Not for newer iPhones 7 and above
customer_reviews.text: I would give have giving this a higher rating but with the iPhone XR,it wouldn't work this is for phone with a earplug jack not the newer phone without . It seemed our would be very user friendly and easy to install, just make sure you read the description before ordering
customer_reviews.author: Shamonda

customer_reviews.title: Setting up the account was easy. I actually had two cards so I see ...
customer_reviews.text: Setting up the account was easy. I actually had two cards so I see if the payment was processed properly. So I swiped my card, the payment was subtracted off my card immediately, but the payment was not made to my other account. It is not 1 1/2 weeks and nothing. Beware before buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alisia Grady

customer_reviews.title: Great for sales. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a crafter so I needed a better way of sale my product. Up until now it was cash only and I lost business because I didn't have a card reader. A fellow crafter told me about the square device and it has increased my sales.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Scott

customer_reviews.title: stay far from it.
customer_reviews.text: extremely bad, need to swipe your card with the rigth amount of pressure and speed for it to work. Spend about 5 min for cards to read. Definitely not recommend for business or you will look stupid in front of customer. Aside from that its pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: roberto

customer_reviews.title: Got power - WORKS Great!
customer_reviews.text: Take your battery pack along - I'm a TUPPERWARE CONSULTANT - "70 years of Party" Strong and more... I love this at Events! and parties!
customer_reviews.author: BEARICA

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Makes taking payments on location a breeze. Small so it's easy and light to carry. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Viki

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: This stats it can be used with android. Not so. It's too small for my phone and doesn't stay in the jack opening. S ed nding back.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Caffery

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I found out after I ordered that if you just download the app first they send you a free one! I love that is white. Love that is compact. It comes with a code for a full refund!!
customer_reviews.author: A.I.

customer_reviews.title: Its a card Reader
customer_reviews.text: This is great for starting out. It is a great price and affordable. I would recomend this for anyone starting out. You save money by swiping the card instead of typing it in so purchasing the square reader is better then not having anything. They can be tricky or sometimes you have to play around with them because they don't like to swipe.
customer_reviews.author: Maximum Flush

customer_reviews.title: Useless... absolutely useless
customer_reviews.text: This is useless. The card reader is fine, but the application process is horrible. Because it wouldn’t allow my registration, I messaged customer service, which didn’t reply until 5 days later. They told me that there isn’t anything they can do and now I have a card reader and am not able to use it. I am beyond annoyed and highly suggest you use a different card reader. It isn’t worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: KaylieAnn B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Ther best device you can buy for the on- the- go retailers followed by the low fees. I'm very happy with this product. It's been my life saver.
customer_reviews.author: mene

customer_reviews.title: No item inside
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly factory sealed box was empty, ordering next one, russian rulette, may be will get what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Limoles

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked absolutely perfectly for me! App installed super easily, set up was a breeze and it has been super handy several times since. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Can only use with their app
customer_reviews.text: Description was not specific. This item only works with the downloadable app and not with any other application. Useless for my needs. The company did however refund me in full and did not recoup the product. Good customer service
customer_reviews.author: rogue224

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use for Scout popcorn sales. It worked great with the Trails End popcorn app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New possibilities
customer_reviews.text: The square reader is extremely easy to use. I bought it for a local church that does a variety of bake sales, dinners and fundraisers for the community. They are now able to do card transactions when they would normally only do cash transactions.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Popcorn Sales
customer_reviews.text: We use it for Scouts, super easy to use, very handy, small enough to fit in wallet and carry with you.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMonroe

customer_reviews.title: Impressed and happy with Square
customer_reviews.text: It was really easy to set up and use. Instructions read like they were in English, not a oriental translation.
customer_reviews.author: Seward Bell

customer_reviews.title: Someone stole it cause it wasn't there when I got home from work. Plus its windy out side
customer_reviews.text: Not there when I got home. Not happy about this. Can it please be put in between the doors so the wind or someone does not still it again. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mario Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: You can get it for free!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not knowing that you get a free one when you download the square app! So basically if you purchase this you will get your money back once you get the app. it works great and was very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good software. One problem I had is my ASUS fhd10 tablet does not work with the reader, but an older ASUS I have does. More work needs to be done to ensure compatibility. And the phone app should have the cash drawer included in the app the same as the tablet app. It is very convenient to have for all devices, not just ones with bigger screens.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrrr. Find something better
customer_reviews.text: Only reads half the time. As a business owner, this delay is a real headache, especially when my lines get backed up. Find something better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints From This User
customer_reviews.text: This product is hugely convenient. I am a hairstylist, and adding credit card processing will increase my sales. I chose Square after comparing it to similar devices and services by Paypal and Amazon. Pros: Compact, Nice packaging, Convenient, Easy to setup, Easy to use, can be used on any Android device, not just the Galaxy. Cons: Fee is higher than Amazon, Can't deposit into (my) online bank account, should come with a protective case as it's small and easy to misplace, and quite fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Black

customer_reviews.title: Cha-ching witj quuckness
customer_reviews.text: Money in your account quick with low fees. A great product for hustlin hoes or selling cheap knock off black flag tshirts at your local gastropub....good product-great investment
customer_reviews.author: Devondonder

product_meta.title: Square Reader for magstripe (with headset jack)
product_meta.description: Square Reader for magstripe works with any Square point-of-sale app so you can take payments on your smartphone or tablet at your counter or on the go.
feature_bullets: Accept all major credit and debit cards for one low rate
Pay just 2.6% + $0.10 per swipe for Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and American Express—no hidden fees
Track your earnings and view your complete sales history from the free Square Point of Sale app
Works with Apple and Android devices that have a 3.5 mm headphone jack
Receive $10 in free processing when you activate your Square account. One $10 redemption per Square account. Terms and Conditions apply*

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,502 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Square Credit Card Reader for iPhone, iPad and Android
